body:
And maybe it's an cluster.

On Wed, Dec 19, 2018 at 9:35 AM Shinn Zhang <zhangxin@apache.org> wrote:

> it maybe cause another problem about topology graph. If you don’t take all
> peers. Maybe the topology graph will show that one node calls multiple
> MySQL node. I think this is a problem.
>
> On Wed, Dec 19, 2018 at 9:29 AM XiaoFu <notifications@github.com> wrote:
>
>> The cluster client of Canal is only the active and standby switch. When
>> it switches the node, the plugin can get another ip of it.
>>
>> —
>> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
>>
>>
>> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
>> <https://github.com/apache/incubator-skywalking/pull/2035#issuecomment-448435849>,
>> or mute the thread
>> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AL3D3yzznH2XUTorhe5B0NnnzYbPPsNnks5u6ZZvgaJpZM4ZNMiF>
>> .
>>
>

Instead of `@RequestMapping`,any things that enhance the `dubbo service interface`will cause this problem, such as `@Trace` on method,`@Service` in `optional-spring-plugins` etc  .
so I preferred this plugin will be put in official plugin that makes it  run well in all this situation if this plugin has no side effect to each `dubbo` versions.

same issues to me these days.😄

>. Maybe the topology graph will show that one node calls multiple
MySQL node

What have to do with mysql node?  It’s  canal node.

> I think this is a problem.

yes, you are right. 

>And maybe it's an cluster.

But it is possible that a node is dead, it is not a cluster.

In my opinion, as time goes by that the dead nodes will disappear in dashboard.
Is my idea correct?

I don't think so. IMO, if those peers is an cluster , and it should be an node in the topology graph. if one node of those peer is broker,  maybe we can take another way to let the user know, e.g. alarm

hi @ascrutae 
Thx for your answer.i already fix it that it  support multiple IP .
English only in GitHub and ml

I use this way to print traceId 
https://logging.apache.org/log4j/2.x/manual/thread-context.html

but it's not official method

> so I preferred this plugin will be put in the official plugin that makes it run well in all this situation if this plugin has no side effect to each dubbo versions.

I don't know whether there are side effects or not. Look like shouldn't have. If @ascrutae and @candyleer both want to put it into the default plugin folder, I think we could try. But please keep this in a separated plugin jar file, in case side effect happens, user could remove it.

How about this?
TID:N/A means, you agent is not active or not working, such as, no backend available. Remember, SkyWalking is not a log assist solution. It is an Observability Platform.

> Question1:I read this article https://github.com/SkywalkingTest/Agent-Benchmarks/blob/master/README.md ,But I did not find the collector configuration connection es part, is it the default configuration?

This article is using mock backend for performance tests, nothing about backend.

> Question2:When I used jmeter to test, the CPU was stable around 25-30 without probes. After adding probes, the CPU in the first test could reach 100 in the first few minutes, and then dropped to about 35-40. The second test was normal, and there was no peak value, was it because of preheating? How do you optimize this?

First, the agent will make CPU a little higher in the first minutes, maybe because
1. More classes(agent's) loaded into JVM.
1. Instrumentation(change binary codes) in runtime costs CPU
1. The first few times access, trigger agent class loader working.
1. Some JIT works triggered.

@wu-sheng I am worried about whether this online service will kill the previous online service directly, because the CPU is really high.
In addition, do you have real tests instead of mock tests?

I don't understand what you are saying. Which online service?
What is your question? What do you mean kill?
Mock tests are for isolate backend and agents tests. They are real tests.
Can I understand it this way? Does it mean that you only tested the performance difference between agents or not? The collector and es are not in the scope of the test at all
Yes. That depends on Elasticsearch cluster scale and performance. You could learn it from many places.

Ok.
I am not sure. Do you find any error during startup? I have tested sql storage several times. Also, beta release should be in next week.

I test connection(jdbc:h2:mem:skywalking-oap-dbf) with H2 Console, result is successful.

Thank for your help.
Are you running h2 separately? And which version do you use? Tests are passed in release process.

Hi @wu-sheng, 
I download from [SkyWalking releases](http://skywalking.apache.org/downloads/) windows zip. 

I unzip it and dbclick bin\startup.bat .
沒裝 H2 之前，就會有個 SQL 的錯誤了哦!
所以我才想說是不是 h2 沒有安裝，就下載最新版本來安裝，結果還是一樣的結果。

安裝過程如下，
1. 下載 [SkyWalking releases](http://skywalking.apache.org/downloads/) for windows.
2. 安裝 open JDK 並設定環境變數
3. 解壓縮，並執行 bin/startup.bat
4. 開啟 Browser，localhost:8080

Why needs install h2? I am confusing. H2 should run in memory mode and inside backend for demo only. If you want to use sql database as storage, try next release. 6 Beta should be available in next week.

Hi @wu-sheng ,
    Ok! Thanks.
I will remove h2, and try again.

Again, h2 just for first time demo. No production ever. Personally, Elasticsearch is always used, if you need a lot of traces saved. If you prefer metric, just backend trace sample, choose beta mysql or tidb.

Hi @wu-sheng , 
好的，看來有蠻多的資訊要學習。
請問您有什麼學習的清單可介紹嗎? 
Thanks.

I could find some articles in official blogs. There is a long list for prev version, http://skywalking.apache.org/zh/blog/2018-12-21-SkyWalking-source-code-read.html

SkyWalking 6 is very new, so not many articles. For me, I will always choose 6, easier to understand amd extend.

Hi @wu-sheng ,
感謝您的分享，謝謝您。

Version updated to 6 GA
Any update? This pr stays in silence for last whole week. If no more update in next week, @candyleer you decide to close it or provide by yourself.
Any update?
Please update version, we should merge this.

my elasticsearch is elasticsearch-5.6.8。Many people encounter this problem.
by'Field named mi in application_alarm_list_month index not found'
This is not an issue. This is because they upgrade the version. Please read the comments.

> Any update?

just update test case..im busy recently. and i have prepared this test case.but im not sure  whether test case works well or not..i'll check the checkstyle of  test case and its correctness
Sure. Take your time. I am tracking all open pr status. And version have updated to 6.0 ga. Your plugin version needs to update too, in order to make ci pass.
The easiest way, check the data in your storage, such as ElasticSearch. such as all_p99. You wil find the real time in it. The time is based on agent time zone, not backend's.
Closing. No update in 6 days.
No update in 10days. Closing.
Closing, PR is going to merge soon.
OK
My company is also using redisson component(3.6.0). I'll finish it at https://github.com/apache/incubator-skywalking/pull/2083

i have the same error. i fix it with the commad: git config --global core.longpaths true.
the reason i found in web is: git can create 4096 len filename, but the windows max len is 260. git use old windows api.
more detail : https://blog.csdn.net/liuxiao723846/article/details/78329223
@wu-sheng    Hi,The es version is 5.6.8, and the skywalking version is 5.0GA. How to solve this problem, is it upgrading es or skywalking?

sorry， it's two errors.

Hello, I am trying to use 5.0 GA version with mysql but getting exception which is bellow, can you guys help me ?
